work.summary: I work in a team called checkout and fullfilment some of our KPI include Checkout conversion, drive down delivery expenditure and Checkout performance
highlights: Creating new 3rd party integration and implementing circuit breakers to help with fallback between old and new APIs
Lead major initiatives like finding ways to reduce deliveries per order ratio, deliver on promise and reducing contact per order ratio.

Creating various alerts such as payment method/provider not responding or responding with a 5XX status code. Using SQL scraper and prometheus we collect data from several services and generate reports and alerts which are send to our slack alert channels.
Migrated legacy project to run and deploy in kubernates
Created new app using python flask and mongoDB, the app read from old MySQL database, cleaned data and exported it in a new json format that was stored in MongoDB
Setting up user profiles, emails, and issuing access passes for new employees and assisting in all password-related issues
Install and configure computer hardware operating systems and applications
Conduct electrical safety checks on computer equipment.
Provide support, including procedural documentation and relevant reports
